snippet.title: Slayaway Camp II | Official Game Teaser | Netflix
snippet.description:
Puzzle and horror fan? Dive into the hilarious Slayaway Camp 2: Netflix & Kill. This tongue-in-cheek adventure game offers a killer mix of horror and comedy. Available now for some spooky fun! 👻 #GeekedWeek

SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/29qBUt7

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with over 247 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Slayaway Camp II | Official Game Teaser | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix

Leave no survivors. In this sequel, you're Skullface, a killer stuck inside a retro horror movie catalog — solve puzzles, stalk victims and get stabby.
